revised_title: A Description of Parhelia Observed in Kent in December 1741
tldr: This article describes the parhelia, or "mock suns," observed in Kent on December 19, 1741. The author, Mrs. Tennison, provides a detailed account of the event and includes a drawing of the phenomenon. The event is also mentioned in a letter from the Reverend H. Miles to John Eames, F.R.S., and Dr. Stukeley includes a similar drawing in his account of the event.
